### LSTM Neural Network for Time Series Prediction

The following article sections will briefly touch on LSTM neuron cells, give a toy example of predicting a sine wave then walk through the application to a stochastic time series. The article assumes a basic working knowledge of simple deep neural networks.

### E-Commerce Platform

I am working on e-commerce platform for developing both front end and backend.On Backend we are using spring boot microserivces with kafka(for messaging queue) foccusing on handling multiple requiest and huge request.

### Technology Stack
- Java 8
- React js
- Spring boot
- underrtow server
- Sass
- SCSS
